title: Constructivist-Based Practical Math Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course centered on solving real-world workplace problems with mathematical approaches for current practitioners, utilizing collaboration tools in BYOD environments and project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematical modeling framework by analyzing real workplace cases.
Learners can autonomously operate a problem-definition-solution-evaluation process through collaboration with peers.
Learners can systematically document and present mathematical decision-making processes through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
